greenberet.title: Green Beret (Rush'n Attack)
greenberet.description: Rush'n Attack is a side-scrolling action platformer where players control a special ops soldier infiltrating enemy bases to rescue POWs and defeat foes using mainly a combat knife.

supermariobros.title: Super Mario Bros.
supermariobros.description: A remaster of the original Super Mario Bros., released exclusively as part of the Super Mario All-Stars bundle.Rating: 91.5

greatgianasistersiii.title: The Great Giana Sisters III
greatgianasistersiii.description: A fan-made sequel to the classic platformer, featuring new levels and challenges for Giana.

hoverbovver.title: Hover Bovver
hoverbovver.description: Hover Bovver is a lawn-mowing action game where players must mow lawns while avoiding angry homeowners and a pursuing dog.

montyontherun.title: Monty on the Run
montyontherun.description: Guide Monty Mole through a series of platforming challenges as he escapes the law.

lasersquad.title: Laser Squad
lasersquad.description: A tactical turn-based strategy game where you command a squad in various missions.

brucelee.title: Bruce Lee
brucelee.description: Bruce Lee is a video game designed by Ron J. Fortier, with graphics by Kelly Day and music by John A. Fitzpatrick. It was originally developed for the Atari 8-bit family and published in 1984 by Datasoft, along with a port for the Commodore 64. The game was converted to the ZX Spectrum and Amstrad CPC and published by U.S. Gold in the same year. An MSX version was published in 1985 by Comptiq.Bruce Lee is a platform game/beat 'em up hybrid, in which the player controls Bruce Lee.Rating: 79.0

spyvsspyiitheislandcaper.title: Spy vs Spy II - The Island Caper
spyvsspyiitheislandcaper.description: Outwit your rival spy in this trap-filled, split-screen action game sequel.

platforms.c64: /home/gdo/ROMs/c64/Spy vs Spy II - The Island Caper (7269).zip

superpipeline.title: Super Pipeline
superpipeline.description: Protect your pipeline from saboteurs and keep the oil flowing in this arcade-style game.

zorkiithewizardoffrobozz.title: Zork II - The Wizard of Frobozz
zorkiithewizardoffrobozz.description: The second part of the legendary text adventure series. Explore, solve puzzles, and survive.

knucklebuster.title: Knuckle Buster
knucklebuster.description: A fast-paced action game where you must fight your way through waves of enemies.

montymole.title: Monty Mole
montymole.description: Help Monty Mole escape from the coal mines in this classic platform adventure.

alteregomaleversion.title: Alter Ego - Male Version
alteregomaleversion.description: Alter Ego - Male Version is a life simulation game released in 1986 where players navigate the experiences and choices of a male character from infancy to old age, shaping his personality and destiny.

elite.title: Elite
elite.description: A groundbreaking space trading and combat simulator. Explore, trade, and fight your way to Elite status.

blackthunder.title: Black Thunder
blackthunder.description: Black Thunder is a very fast side scrolling game similar to Suicide Express. The gaming is straight forward just steer and shoot. Cool voices and great music.

jumpman.title: Jumpman
jumpman.description: Navigate platforms, avoid hazards, and defuse bombs in this classic action game.

pottypigeon.title: Potty Pigeon
pottypigeon.description: Guide your pigeon to collect twigs and build a nest while avoiding dangers.

spellbound.title: Spellbound
spellbound.description: Solve puzzles and cast spells as Magic Knight in this adventure game.

paradroid.title: Paradroid
paradroid.description: Take control of robots and clear the spaceship decks in this top-down action classic.

sanxion.title: Sanxion
sanxion.description: Pilot your ship through scrolling levels, shooting enemies and dodging obstacles.

aufwiedersehenmonty.title: Auf Wiedersehen Monty
aufwiedersehenmonty.description: Monty On the Run is a platform-style game featuring Monty Mole, a coal thief fleeing across Europe to escape the Intermole agency. Players navigate Monty through 80 screens representing European landmarks, using various movement techniques like super-leaps and ceiling suspension. The goal is to collect Eurocheques and plane tickets while avoiding hazards. The game incorporates unique elements such as drunkenness effects from wine bottles and aerial combat sequences. As the third main entry in the Monty Mole series, it builds upon the gameplay mechanics of its predecessors while introducing new challenges and environments.Rating: 94.1

greatgianasistersthe.title: The Great Giana Sisters
greatgianasistersthe.description: After falling into a dark, deep sleep, little Giana finds herself in a mysterious dreamworld where everything is strange and different. Many fascinating creatures lurk in this place full of traps and complicated mazes.But Giana must possess the magical diamond before she can return!Two players can enjoy this fun-filled game with over 30 completely different levels.The five-voiced musical sounds and the ever-changing graphics will make you want to play THE GREAT GIANA SISTERS over and over again.Rating: 74.3

archon.title: Archon
archon.description: Archon is a 1983 action-strategy game where players battle for control of a chess-like board using fantastical creatures with real-time combat encounters.

alteredbeast.title: Altered Beast
alteredbeast.description: Originally released by Sega in arcades in 1988, Altered Beast is a side-scrolling beat 'em up later ported to various home platforms, including the Commodore 64 (C64). In this game, you play as a resurrected warrior chosen by Zeus to rescue his daughter Athena from the underworld ruler Neff. The gameplay involves battling hordes of undead and mythological monsters across five stages set in ancient Greece. Collecting spirit orbs transforms you into powerful beast forms such as a werewolf, allowing for special attacks and abilities.  The C64 adaptation replicates the core action and challenge of the arcade original, with graphics and sound optimized for Commodore’s hardware. Despite technical limitations, it captures the essence of this cult classic—offering fans of action games a nostalgic adventure through myth and legend.

amcattackofthemutantcamels.title: Attack of the Mutant Camels
amcattackofthemutantcamels.description: The player controls a small jetplane and has the task of killing giant yellow camels before they reach the home base. Doing so requires several dozens of shots. The camels retaliate by shooting fireballs from their mouth.Each camel required several shots to destroy; if a camel reached the base, the game was over. Once all camels on a level had been killed, the player had to survive a "hyperspace" sequence which required avoiding high-speed missiles. Upon successful completion, the next level presented a new wave of camels, with slightly harder gameplay.

zorkithegreatundergroundempire.title: Zork
zorkithegreatundergroundempire.description: Zork is one of the earliest interactive fiction computer games, with roots drawn from the original genre game, Colossal Cave Adventure. The first version of Zork was written in 1977–1979 using the MDL programming language on a DEC PDP-10 computer.Rating: 69.8

alteregofemaleversion.title: Alter Ego
alteregofemaleversion.description: Alter Ego - Female Version is a text-based life simulation game released in 1986, where players guide a female character through various life stages by making choices that shape her personality and experiences.

zorkquestiassaultonegrethcastle.title: Zork Quest I - Assault on Egreth Castle

boulderdash.title: Boulder Dash
boulderdash.description: Boulder Dash was originally released in 1984 for Atari 8-bit computers. It was developed and published by First Star Software, and spawned a series of sequels, re-releases, and spinoffs. It also did a great deal to establish and influence the mining genre of video games, which can be seen in modern games such as Minecraft, Spelunky, and Terraria.Rating: 72.7

jetsetwillyiithefinalfrontier.title: Jet Set Willy II - The Final Frontier

platforms.c64: /home/gdo/ROMs/c64/Jet Set Willy II - The Final Frontier (3927).zip

zorkquestiithecrystalofdoom.title: Zork Quest II - The Crystal of Doom

beyondtheforbiddenforest.title: Beyond the Forbidden Forest
beyondtheforbiddenforest.description: Great atmosphere, weird clever graphics and amazingly spooky music. This is a genuinely unsettling game but a brilliant one. Nothing else like it. Get this game anyway you can.(Broozor - Lemon64.com)

wayoftheexplodingfistthe.title: Way of the Exploding Fist, The

aztecchallenge.title: Aztec Challenge
aztecchallenge.description: In the Aztec empire you were chosen for sacrifice.A forthcoming violent death you can only escape when a risky obstacle course face - the "Aztec Challenge".But that is no picnic: at the beginning it will be from "all sides" . pelted with spears, while one has to work its almost endless way to the templeOnce there it is not friendly: trapdoors, falling boulders, snakes and spiders waiting for new victims.it is a moral imperative and a two-player mode - unfortunately alternate the players then only from.the game features 7 breathtaking levels (plus end bonus), in which a good reactivity is required. The graph corresponds unfortunately only the ordinary 1984, but does not spoil the good game idea. Moreover, good acoustics for the right mood makes.Ideal: one has reached a higher level, you do not have to start again when all lives are exhausted.Rating: 75.1
